input.sentences: police soldiers in glowing green | are prepared for duty in the first line of defense at this riot control .
but this day glow man looks lost while he surveys the crowd as it peacefully overtakes him and his comrades .
one protester attempts small talk with the defenders of the helm but they will have none of it .
a lone protester stands out from the crowd with a sign that seems to support violence .
this individual group of rioters appear more dangerous than their signs which bear their own interesting messages .
